1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: WN_YESNO.C Mon 11-06-2000 10:10:25 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | #include <stdarg.h>
6    | #include "keys.h"
7    | #include "window.h"
8    | 
9    | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
10   |     FUNCTION: wn_yesno()
11   |      PURPOSE: Display an message in a window with 2 exit buttons: YES and NO
12   |       SYNTAX: int wn_yesno(char *format, ...);
13   |  DESCRIPTION: uses wn_dialog in the middle of the screen.
14   |      RETURNS: Choise to end this dialog: 'Y', 'N' or ESC.
15   |      HISTORY: 920213 V0.1 - Initial version
16   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
17   | int wn_yesno(char *format, ...)
18   | {
19   |   va_list arguments;
20   |   int _tmp_att;
21   |   char s[132];
22   | 
23   |   static MENU menu[] =
24   |   {
25   |     {"Yes", 0 },
26   |     {"No",  0 },
27   |     { NULL }
28   |   };
29   |   int choise = ESC;
30   | 
31   |   menu[0].flags |= EXIT;
32   |   menu[1].flags |= EXIT;
33   | 
34   |   va_start(arguments,format);
35   |   vsprintf(s,format,arguments);
36   |   va_end(arguments);
37   | 
38   |   _tmp_att = _dialog_att;
39   |   choise = wn_dialog(13,40,2,menu,1,s);
40   |   _dialog_att = _tmp_att;
41   | 
42   |   return(choise);
43   | }
